pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Bias Correction of Climate Model Outputs // Calibrate and apply multivariate bias correction algorithms for climate model simulations of multiple climate variables. Three methods described by Cannon (2016) doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-15-0679.1 and Cannon (2017) doi:10.1007/s00382-017-3580-6 are implemented: 1) MBC Pearson correlation (MBCp), 2) MBC rank correlation (MBCr), and 3) MBC N-dimensional PDF transform (MBCn).
